wikipedia_page.main:
Theodore Hartman Just (23 April 1886 – 13 February 1937) was a British athlete. He competed at the 1908 Summer Olympics in London.In the 800 metres, Just won his first round heat easily with a time of 1:57.8. He then placed fifth in the final with a time of 1:56.4.
He was also a member of the British relay team. He ran the 800 metres in the medley relay competition, but his team was eliminated in the first round.
